General.Name: NVH Korea Inc
General.Description: NVH Korea Inc. manufactures and sells automotive noise, vibration, and heat control parts in South Korea and internationally. The company offers interior systems, such as isolation dash pads, tunnel pads, floor modules, car mats, carpet skins, and sound absorption pads; exterior systems, including under covers, insulator tunnels, and wheel guards; and overhead systems comprising headliners and sun visors. It also provides engine systems consisting of partition engine rooms, insulator dashes, and hood insulators; door trims; and control assy-water temperature, cylinder block covers, and thermal management systems. NVH Korea Inc. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
